item.title: I'm getting an os upgrade for 10 bucks!
item.description: With Snow Leopard, Apple has the first time done something that has made me go wow! An almost free OS upgrade. This kinda beats the crap out of paying a couple hundred for Win7. Posted via email from shiva’s posterous
